t: Psalm 147
God Restores Jerusalem
Hallelujah!*pn How*ln good it is to sing to our God, for*ln praise is pleasant and lovely.
The*pn Lord*s rebuilds Jerusalem; he*ln gathers Israelâ€™s exiled people.
He*ln heals the brokenhearted and*ln bandages their wounds.
He*ln counts the number of the stars; he*ln gives names to all of them.
Our*ln Lord is great, vast in power; his*ln understanding is infinite.
The*ln Lord*s helps the oppressed but*ln brings the wicked to the ground.

who*ln covers the sky with clouds, prepares*ln rain for the earth, and*ln causes grass to grow on the hills.
He*ln provides the animals with their food, and*ln the young ravens what they cry for.

He*ln has not done this for every nation; they*ln do not know his judgments. Hallelujah!*ln
